cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6837, No TikTok on Department of Homeland Security Devices Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 35 (Friday, February 25, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GUEST:
H.R. 6837.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H1148]

latestAction.text: Subcommittee on Oversight, Management, and Accountability Discharged.

title: No TikTok on Department of Homeland Security Devices Act
